Constructor Detail

ExtendedThread

public ExtendedThread()
Default constructor.

ExtendedThread

public ExtendedThread(ExtendedRunnable run)
Constructor with an ExtendedRunnable, just like new Thread(Runnable r). There are no initializers here. Therefore the initialized Runnable will have no easy way to initialize local variables.

Parameters:
run - the Runnable to initialize from.

ExtendedThread

public ExtendedThread(ExtendedRunnable run,
                      java.lang.Object... initializers)
Constructor with an ExtendedRunnable and initialization arguments.

Parameters:
run - the Runnable to initialize from.
initializers - Objects to initialize
